_sText:
Dark Arena was designed to be ideal for clan competitions and tournaments. Rush to the top story arena where it's well-lit... Meet your enemies head-on, running for the over-loaded M4's and AK-47's in the mid-section, or rush up to the platforms to get one of the AWPs. OR... Go down into the lower levels, where it's pitch-black. Equip your flashlight and go hunting for more specific weapons. Hide in the darkness to surprise unsuspecting people on a scavenger hunt for guns. TIPS
  • You don't start with a knife, but knives are hidden throughout the map!
  • Try shooting off the locker doors in the locker room and see what you find!
  • If rushing up to the arena, throw grenades up to the opposite platform quickly - blow away their AWPs before they can reach them! Careful, you might just end up shooting an AWP right into someone's hands smile
  • Shoot the glass windows in the middle of the arena! Send the explosive barrels rolling down until they drop through the vertical passages into the room below. Drop in a grenade or shoot one barrel, the rest go off, and anyone camping down in that room is blown to bits!
  • Also, if someone is crossing on either side of the arena, release the explosive barrels and ignite them right in front of the guy! Either way, you get credit for barrel kills!
